publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-333# Tricia Marwick: Fife Rail Service—That the Parliament notes with concern the appalling level of rail services being provided to the people of Fife and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to ScotRail and Railtrack to improve this service. Supported by: Scott Barrie*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Mr Nick Johnston*, David Mundell*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Colin Campbell*

S1M-333# Tricia Marwick: Fife Rail Service—That the Parliament notes with concern the appalling level of rail services being provided to the people of Fife and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to ScotRail and Railtrack to improve this service. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Mr Nick Johnston, David Mundell, Colin Campbell, Mr Keith Harding*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Fiona McLeod*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rhoda Grant*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Alasdair Morgan*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Bruce Crawford*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Brian Adam*, Linda Fabiani*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S1M-333# Tricia Marwick: Fife Rail Service—That the Parliament notes with concern the appalling level of rail services being provided to the people of Fife and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to ScotRail and Railtrack to improve this service. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Nick Johnston, David Mundell, Colin Campbell, Mr Keith Harding, Irene McGugan, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Rhoda Grant, Alasdair Morgan, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Bruce Crawford, Brian Adam, Linda Fabiani, Marilyn Livingstone, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Shona Robison*
S1M-333# Fife Rail Service (lodged on 29 November 1999) Alex Neil*
